title: CPA on Vuelta a España Heatwave: ‘It Is Borderline, But OK’
content:
Riders’ association president Adam Hansen in contact with riders, Vuelta organizer and the UCI over oppressive heat: 'Some riders are struggling worse than others.'

Read the full article at CPA on Vuelta a España Heatwave: ‘It Is Borderline, But OK’ on Velo.
